text.more:
Nodes color represent the number of nomination a movie got (Oscars + Golden Globes) : the darker the higher. 
The nodes size represent the number of awards a movie got (Oscars + Golden Globes) : the bigger the higher. 
The Network is represented as a cricle pack layout on the Component id, the modularity and the clustering coefficient.
text.intro:
The network is built to connect similar movies of the IMDb data sample from Kaggle. 
The Goal is to use the network to structure to predict wether a movie will be nominated to an Award (Oscars or GoldenGlobes)
text.title: IMDb network with Awards
